1101100000101111 1011001010101011 0 -> sum: 1000101011011010, cout: 1

1110100001010001 0110100000101010 1 -> sum: 0101000001111100, cout: 1

1101110111110101 1111101010110101 1 -> sum: 1101100010101011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
